comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I wasn't there, but the caption on the photo says "Dubuc." Detroit had a pitcher by that name in 1913: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Dubuc I have to admit that the guy looks like the Bush in this link, though: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donie_Bush Here's a team photo from 1913 with both men in it: you make the call: homepage.mac.com/artscape_galleries/.Pictures/Sports/Detr...
